docs.title: Biography
docs.text:
Hello! I am Eric, a first-year Ph.D. student in computer science at University of California, Santa Cruz. I am very fortunate to be advised by Prof. Yuyin Zhou and Prof. Cihang Xie.

I obtained my M.S. degree in computer science from Nanjing University advised by Prof. Yinghuan Shi in June 2023. I also received my B.Eng. degree in computer science in June 2020 from Nanjing Normal University, fortunately working with Prof. Wanqi Yang.

My research mainly focus on the intersection of computer vision and machine learning.
